channel.title: Video Creation on The AI Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Video Creation on The AI Talks

item.title: Video Creation with Diffusion Models
item.description: Speaker Zhangjie Wu is a third-year Ph.D. student at Show Lab, National University of Singapore, working with Prof. Mike Zheng Shou. Prior to this, he obtained his Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from Shen Yuan Honors College at Beihang University. His research focuses on AI for video understanding and generation. His representative works include Tune-A-Video, Show-1, and MotionDirector. Abstract Diffusion models have ushered in a new era of video content creation.
